description: Enhances support for StationPlaylist apps. In addition, adds global commands for the Studio application from everywhere.
changelog:
* NVDA 2025.1.2 or later is required.
* In Studio, search history in track finder (Control+NVDA+F) is deprecated and will be removed in a future release to align with NVDA's own find dialog experience.
* In Studio, performing SPL Controller layer entry command will enter SPL Assistant layer, and the add-on setting to configure this option is checked by default for new installations.

translations.description: Verbessert die Unterstützung für StationPlaylist-Anwendungen. Darüber hinaus werden globale Befehle für die Studio-Anwendung von überall aus hinzugefügt.
translations.changelog:
* NVDA 2025.1.2 or later is required.
* In Studio, search history in track finder (Control+NVDA+F) is deprecated and will be removed in a future release to align with NVDA's own find dialog experience.
* In Studio, performing SPL Controller layer entry command will enter SPL Assistant layer, and the add-on setting to configure this option is checked by default for new installations.

Aprimora o suporte aos aplicativos StationPlaylist. Além disso, adiciona comandos globais para o aplicativo Studio de qualquer lugar.Melhora o suporte para aplicativos StationPlaylist.
